about_the_game:
Get equipped with the pulse-pounding beats and shredding guitars of the Mega Man X Legacy Collection Soundtrack, featuring brand new remixes and tracks made especially for Mega Man X Legacy Collection 1 + 2!

The 62-minute soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
